relation.text: 1788 My Dear Mrs : D : Altho ' you desired
Winter -- which hurry I do not allow
lead here wd . do me . The Weather has been remarkably fine , & the Soil is so dry , I that after one Day
s Rain , wh : we had , ( it was last Sunday
wrote this , I awkwardly strained my Knee wh : I have done twice since I had the Rheumatic attack
fear They have no Lady now
